title: Demonstrating KBinsDiscretizer Strategies
description: In this lab, we will explore the different strategies available in the KBinsDiscretizer class of the Python scikit-learn library. KBinsDiscretizer is a class for discretizing continuous features into categorical features by binning the continuous data. We will visualize the different strategies by applying them to different datasets.

meta.title: Exploring Discretization Strategies with KBinsDiscretizer
meta.description: Discover the different discretization strategies in Python's scikit-learn library for transforming continuous data into categorical features.
meta.keywords: machine learning, categorical features, discretization, continuous data, kbinsdiscretizer, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground, machine learning playground, data preprocessing

i18n.title: 演示KBinsDiscretizer策略
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索Python的scikit-learn库中KBinsDiscretizer类可用的不同策略。KBinsDiscretizer是一个通过对连续数据进行装箱，将连续特征离散化为分类特征的类。我们将通过将不同策略应用于不同数据集来可视化这些策略。

meta.title: 使用KBinsDiscretizer探索离散化策略
meta.description: 探索Python的scikit-learn库中用于将连续数据转换为分类特征的不同离散化策略。
meta.keywords: 机器学习, 分类特征, 离散化, 连续数据, kbinsdiscretizer, scikit-learn, scikit-learn游乐场, 机器学习游乐场, 数据预处理
